Overview & Projects Software Meetings Communication Members

Software

  • Panda

    • C++/python-based analysis framework consisting in an ntuplizer and an analyzer. It reads in input the centrally-produced CMS dataformat (MiniAOD).

  • Coffea

    • Apache-Spark-based analysis framework consisting in an ntuplizer that relies on the offcial CMS software to generate custom-made NanoAOD, and an analyzer built with modern Big Data tools. Currently under development.

  • Simulation

    • Software packages for private signal model generation.

Built by Matteo Cremonesi with Jekyll using Scribble.
